EmailTemplate.subject: Happy Work Anniversary {!Contact.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Congratulations on completing another successful year with us! We want to take this opportunity to thank you for your dedication, hard work, and passion for your job. Your contributions have made a significant impact on our company's growth, and we appreciate all that you do.
We are excited to see what the future holds for us and to continue our partnership for many more years to come. Once again, congratulations on your work anniversary!
Regards,
The Cloud Peritus Team
